## Features
- Health checks
- Schema management
- Policy validation & evaluation
- IAM Policy CRUD operations
- Playground (ad-hoc policy testing)

## Setup
1. Create an environment with variable: `baseUrl` = `http://localhost:8080/api/v1`
2. Run requests in order (IAM section extracts variables for chaining)
3. Playground requests are independent and showcase various scenarios
